products.title: My Wyn Semillon (2013)
products.description: Only one barrel made, the grapes from a 75-year old vineyard. Fermented and matured on the lees for ten months in second fill French oak barrel.

products.title: Damarakloof Racetrack Chenin Blanc (2007)
products.description: Ripe and plump 2006 from old vines on nearby Joostenberg, stewed apple and spice enveloped in warm and waxy texture, courtesy natural ferment and 9 months in older oak.

products.title: My Wyn Petit Verdot (2012)
products.description: 21 Days' maceration in open 500l barrels. 22 Months' barrel maturation in second-fill French oak barrels. Some perfume on the nose. On the palate aromas of ripe fruit, blue berries and an earthy undertone. Complements wild food, such as game, ostrich, wild boar or slow stewed bredies. A real winter warmer.

products.title: Thorne and Daughters Copper Pot (2012)
products.description: The 2012 Copper Pot red combines cool climate Syrah with Mourvedre (and a cheeky splash of Grenache). The aromas are reminiscent of wild hedgerow fruit like plums, damson, blackberry, and rose hips, with a dash of cinnamon and clove spice. In the mouth, there is loads of fresh, bright red fruits and a plum-skin grip from whole bunch fermentation. This wine demands hearty cuisine and good conversation.

products.title: Eagles Nest Merlot (2011)
products.description: Meticulous attention in the vineyard and cellar combine to produce a wine that’s nose is a textured array of gorgeous red berry fruit, complemented by nuanced savoury spice and crushed pepper. The fruit is vibrant, complex and focused by bright acidity. On the palate the delicious dark cherry fruit of the nose is carried through to the taste buds and they combine harmoniously to give a rewarding taste sensation.

products.title: De Toren Fusion V (2011)
products.description: The nose boasts bold aromas of blackberries and blueberries with an underlying darker side of leather, mocha, and a hint of cedar. The pallet exudes opulence, sophistication, and power with strong, but finely knit tannins that follow into flavours of licorice, black cherry, cedar and berries. Soft, sultry and sexy on the palate. Extremely concentrated with great purity, intensity and balance. The long finish ends with a blast of sweet black fruit. The wine will only improve with age.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Beta Phase Trial Membership
products.purchase_note:
Congratulations for joining up as MyVinos Private Beta Phase trail membership.
Membership entitles you to receive free on-demand Wine Steward deliveries of your selected wine (within the Delivery Zone & during hours of operation).
During this membership period, NO MINIMUM ORDER value will apply!
You will also be invited to join Club events each month.

products.title: VINOS Top-up: R1,000
products.purchase_note: Thank you for purchasing your share of VINOS. Now please select VINOS Account Funds as your payment method when ordering your wine for on-demand delivery.

products.title: VINOS Top-up: R200
products.purchase_note: Thank you for purchasing your share of VINOS. Now please select VINOS Account Funds as your payment method when ordering your wine for on-demand delivery.

products.title: MyVinos Club Membership (Beta)
products.description: Free membership for the Beta-test phase, whilst we perfect the Mobile App (soon to be released in the App Store).
products.short_description: Free membership for the Beta-test phase, whilst we perfect the Mobile App (soon to be released in the App Store).

products.title: Billecart-Salmon Brut Rose
products.description: From this highly-acclaimed champagne House, a delightful rosé with a charming, fruity nose and palate with hints of roasted nuts.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Raats Chenin Blanc Original (2013)
products.description: There is a distinctive yellow apple, pineapple, alongside with notes of green melon and lime. Beautifully structured on the palate, bursting with fresh yellow and white fruit flavours. The wine finishes subtly, yet distinct with great minerality and citrus flavours. The Raats Original Chenin Blanc 2013 is yet a classical example of this wine and shows the balance between power and elegance. Now in its 13th year of production the consistency in quality is unquestionable.

products.title: Luddite Shiraz (2005)
products.description: Brooding dark fruit and spice. Rich, natural and a sweet fruit core. Lingering finish of savoury spice and balanced tannin
categories: I'm with wine geeks. Show me what's interesting.

products.title: Raats Red Jasper (2013)
products.description: The 2013 gemstone is very complex, with subtle dark berry fruit on the nose and all the perfume and violets one would expect from 85% Cabernet Franc. The palate surprises with its darkness of fruit: blue and blackberries, blackcurrant, even bramble, intertwined with hints of tobacco and the darkest of chocolate. Complex and structured, it will be difficult to tire of.
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Raats Dolomite (2013)
products.description: The nose promises mulberries and plummy fruitiness. Dark berry fruit and a minty herbaceousness linger on the palate. The wine is elegant, showing great purity of fruit and is extremely moreish, with a hint of wet-stone minerality.

products.title: Raats Cabernet Franc (2009)
products.description: This sexy, uber-elegant Cabernet Franc shows the stunning heights this grape can attain! It combines a core of luscious blackberry, black cherry, and plum with expressive notes of cinnamon, tobacco, coffee, and spice. Silky tannins caress the palate, and hints of dark chocolate and a great minerality. This wine has a long and supple finish.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Mullineux White Blend (2012)
products.description: An intriguing blend of old bush vine chenin blanc that gives weight and vibrant acidity to the wine, with 16% old vine clairette that adds an aromatic lift and 8% younger viognier that has had a period of skin contact to add additional flavour complexity and palate weight. The wines rich texture is further enhanced by extended aging in old oak barrels on the lees.
categories: We think it's time for a celebration!

products.title: Dorrance Kama (2013)
products.description: From a 38 years old bushvines in the Perderberg region, shows subtle notes of apples,melon and spice. Intriguing spicy palate with a round soft texture and enticing mineral undertones with just a slightest hint of oak. Full on elegance.
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Delaire Coastal Cuvee (2010)
products.description: Expressive green herbal, pepper and citrus notes with some tangerine. Lovely weight with well integrated greenness.

products.title: Beaumont Hope Marguerite (2011)
products.description: Elegantly matured in old 400 litre barrels for 10 months. Natural yeast and grapes from our oldest vineyards (34 and 38 yrs) produces one of South Africa's benchmark Chenin's. Fruit and spice combine to give length and complexity.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Stark-Conde Three Pines (2010)
products.description: An elegant, refined style with exotic spice and aniseed aromas, followed by a mouthful of crushed violets on the palette. Opens up beautifully with correct cellaring which should be rewarded.

products.title: Dorrance Simply Red (2009)
products.description: A smooth and sexy wine with soft tannins, showing flavours of black currant, strawberries, ripe red fruits notes and smoky tones, layered with spices.

products.title: Sijnn (2008)
products.description: Attractive medium deep red colour. Slate, wild fruits, herbs and a spicy leafiness on the nose. Barrel maturation character evident, but not specific oak flavours. Soft, though quietly substantial palate with a nice texture, excellent complexity and an attractive dry finish. May well improve, but this is our second vintage, with little track record, thus recommend drinking within 3 or 4 years.

products.title: Cape Point Vineyards Isliedh (2012)
products.description: Alluring, with tangerine, persimmon, straw and brioche notes aligned with a creamy frame. The long stony finish shows hints of heather and ginger. Drink now through 2015.
categories: We think it's time for a celebration!

products.title: Crystallum Bona Fide (2012)
products.description: A deliciously pure Pinot that is loaded with crushed strawberry, cranberry and blueberry, along with damp earth and forest floor complexity.

products.title: Crystallum Clay Shale Chardonnay (2013)
products.description: The most elegant and complex Clay Shales to date, with a perfect balance of fresh, citrus flavours to fuller peach and butterscotch notes. The mouth feel is full and finely textured and the finish just keeps on going long after the glass is put down.

products.title: Teddy Hall MCC Blanc de Blanc (2008)
products.description: As befits a bubbly, this Blanc de blanc Methode Cap Classique is full of vigorous fine bubbles! A touch nervous with its vibrant acidity carrying the Chardonnay's fruit and yeasty, fresh baked bread flavours on the palate. Given time it will develop additional complexity and depth.

products.title: Buitenverwachting Hussey's Vlei Sauvignon Blanc (2012)
products.description: Extra dimension in this single-site bottling becomes apparent with little bottle age, as 2012's youthfully herbaceous wintergreen tone dissipates to reveal softer side: complex, juicy mélange of rich citrus fruit, sustained by commendable texture and minerality.

products.title: Graham Beck Cuvee Clive (2009)
products.description: An exceptionally complex, yet subtle MCC, approachable and round with the potential to age, remarkably versatile with food. It has undoubtedly achieved all the fundamental prerequisites that a prestige cuvée should have.
categories: We think it's time for a celebration!

products.title: Mullineux Straw Wine (2009)
products.description: Deep golden straw in colour, with a rich, viscous appearance. The nose is a complex, enticing blend of dried peaches, apricots and marmalade, with savoury, nutty aromas of almonds, marzipan and honey. The intense, dizzying mouthfeel is balanced by a clean, fresh and very long finish of dried apricots. The wine is best served chilled at 9 to 11 C.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Chamonix Feldspar Pinot Noir (2013)
products.description: The Feldspar Pinot Noir has a bright red colour. The bouquet is complex with scents recalling wild berries, spice, sour cherries and violets. On the palate the wine shows medium body with fruit flavours balanced elegantly by tannins in a long finish.

products.title: Hamilton Russell Ashbourne (2014)
products.description: Unoaked 2014 as vibrant, zesty as pretty label. 20% chardonnay enrichment reins in some of sauvignon's grassier tones for summer sipping.

products.title: Mount Abora Saffraan Cinsaut (2013)
products.description: Winemaker Johan Meyer coaxes just enough natural grape flavours from the juice to complement the underlying aromas of sea and earth, while ensuring a relatively low level of alcohol. Although the wine expresses an abundance of red berry flavours at a young age, the backbone consisting of expressive grape tannins and natural acid will over time develop the personality of the wine, with floral notes such as jasmine and fynbos coming to the fore as the wine matures.

products.title: Strandveld Adamastor (2012)
products.description: Wet gravel with an intense flintiness, combined with floral aromas. Full and creamy on the palate, with a combination of toasted oak flavours and a dry minerality on the aftertaste.
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Domaine des Dieux MCC Rose de Sharon (2008)
products.description: A berry-basket bouquet. Strawberry, black cherry, raspberry notes jump out of the glass with a hint of mint and rose water in the background. The mousse is fine, and soft, with a rich, generous attack developing beautifully in the mouth into a clean, dry finish. Tantalising balance and generosity of fruit make this a great apéritif and food wine.

products.title: Alheit Vineyards Magnetic North (2013)
products.description: The wine is completely unique, to the point that I wonder if tasting notes are at all relevant. The nose is both bright and slightly earthy, showing flavours of fennel, citrus, quince and fynbos. It’s light on its feet, yet very intense and powerful, showing scintillating natural concentration. The texture is reminiscent of tightly woven, layered cloth. It seems to finish forever, as if the record got stuck or time stopped for a while.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Cape Point Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc Reserve (2012)
products.description: Shows lovely purity, with a beam of gooseberry and Meyer lemon pulsing along, backed by straw, white peach and salted butter notes. Long finish. Drink now through 2015.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Klein Constantia Vin de Constance (2007)
products.description: Burnished copper in colour with alluring, exotic aromas of Turkish Delight intermingle with fragrant honeysuckle, citrus peel and clove spiciness. Unctuously sweet, deeply complex and concentrated tropical and Seville orange marmalade flavours are lifted by a fine acid thread to a satisfyingly long, delicious and lipsmackingly vibrant finish.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Sadie Soldaat (2012)
products.description: Blueberries and violets, hint of Xmas cake, 2012 is seductively perfumed, with the same fruit purity on the palate. Elegant, showcased with minimal trappings, an admirable lesson in thoughtful handling of old Piekenierskloof bushvine grenache.
categories: We think it's time for a celebration!

products.title: Sadie Pofadder (2012)
products.description: Honouring cinsaut, the workhorse red grape of earlier times. From 43 year old vines, bunch ferment, unfined/filtered. Redcurrants and cherries on 2012, touch of scrub, elegantly structured, the tannins mainly from the grapes, giving purity and length.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Sadie Columella (2008) Magnum
products.description: Well-composed 2008 complex, mineral and earthy; finely structured with pinpoint acidity, classic tannins. As sensual as brilliant 2007 with its gravel-tinged fruit. Always shiraz, basket press with a 2 years French oak.
categories: I want to be outrageous - OMG!

products.title: Glenelly Lady May (2008)
products.description: This opaque and onyx colored Cabernet from South Africa opens with a new leather and mild black cherry bouquet. On the palate, this wine is full bodied, balanced and juicy. The flavor profile is a tasty mild black cherry with hints of mild smoky oak and plum. The finish is rather dry and its dusty tannins are very nicely prolonged.

products.title: Paul Cluver Pinot Noir (2013)
products.description: Beautiful aromas of red fruits intermingle with roasted spices followed by a delicious, elegant silky palate of poached ripe plums resulting in medium bodied wine with soft edges. Crafted for drinking now, it has the structure and fruit to be enjoyed for two years and beyond.
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Buitenverwachting Sauvignon Blanc (2014)
products.description: The wine has a pale lemon yellow colour and a bouquet reminiscent of green figs with hints of gooseberries and an intrusion of green peppers. The wine is dry, full bodied and has a long lingering finish.
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Hamilton Russell Chardonnay (2011)
products.description: A tight, minerally wine with classic Hamilton Russell Vineyards length and complexity. Unusually prominent pear and lime fruit aromas and flavours are brought beautifully into focus by a tight line of bright natural acid and a long, dry minerality. An elegant, yet textured and intense wine with a strong personality of both place and vintage.
categories: We think it's time for a celebration!

products.title: Axe Hill Dry White Port (NV)
products.description: Fortified chenin made solera-style. Latest (NV) bottling is tad ponderous, misses buoyancy of previous vintages, obvious spirit, some complexity from nutty dried fruit notes.

products.title: Stark-Conde Oude Nectar (2008) Magnum
products.description: This wine is made from the fruit of the first real harvest, four years after planting. The wine is made similarly to our other cabernets: hand-picked and meticulously sorted, crushed into open tanks and fermented with manual punchdowns done 4-6 times daily. Only natural yeasts were used. After fermentation, the wine was basket pressed directly to barrel for malo-lactic fermentation and 22 months maturation in French oak (50% new; 50% second-fill). It was bottled without fining and filtration. Although it is made from young vines, the wine has an impressive depth and structure and it has an intense floral note that sets it apart from our other cabernets..
categories: We think it's time for a celebration!

products.title: Hamilton Russell Pinot Noir (2007)
products.description: Quite spicy on the nose with great depth, not a massive amount of fruit on the palate, a bit more masculine, yet, still quite powerful.
categories: We think it's time for a celebration!

products.title: Palmer Brut Rose Champagne (NV)
products.description: Intense aromas of wild strawberries with notes of blackcurrants and redcurrants, and delicate spicy notes of vanilla and cinnamon. The mouse is intense, creamy and persistent. The palate is fresh and delicate with tiny and fine bubbles. The finish is elegant and fruity.

products.title: Botanica Chenin Blanc (2012)
products.description: Light yellow in colour with hints of tropical fruit on the nose. This wine has a firm acidity showing mineral flavours on the finish.

products.title: Blackwater Omerta (2013)
products.description: The wine has beguiling aromas of truffle, mushroom and bitter cherries, tight structure but not overworked or extracted. Expected to age for 4 to 6 years.

products.title: Graham Beck MCC Brut (NV) Magnum
products.description: Light yeasty aromas, limey fresh fruit on the nose, and rich creamy complexity on the palate. Fine mousse gives freshness and finesse.

products.title: Glenelly Shiraz Glass (2009)
products.description: The Glass Collection Cabernet Sauvignon develops a very complex nose with flavours of Cassis, blackcurrant, cherry, a touch of spices and chocolate. The wine has a good tannin structure, perfect balance and length, with flavours that are reminiscent of a black forest gateaux on the palate
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Saltare MCC Brut Nature (NV)
products.description: Our Brut Nature is a fresh wine perfect on it's own anytime during the day and amazing with oysters and other seafood. It spends a minimum of 18 months on the lees and we do not add any sugar or sulphur when it is disgorged. The dates of bottling and disgorgement are printed on each label to give you the exact time the bottle has spent on the lees.
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Saltare MCC Brut Reserve (NV)
products.description: Our Brut Reserve is our more mature, smoother blend, fuller in character but still with the lively freshness of the Brut Nature. It spends at least 36 months on the lees for added depth and flavour.

products.title: Peter Bayly Vintage Port (2009) - 375ml
products.description: A pitch black centre and garnet hued rim invites one into a bouquet bursting with aromas of black hedgerow fruits, plum, “fynbos”, mulling spices and undertones of new leather, cacao, liquorice and brandied apricots.  Black cherry, macerated brambles, plump fresh plums, cracked pepper, all-spice, fynbos, liquorice and “meaty” undertones all vie for attention from the taste buds.  The palate is complex, dense and the finish is, characteristic of only the finest Cape Vintage Port, dry and endless with the lingering twang of liquorice and spicy brandied fruits.
categories: Now let's get the party going!

products.title: Palmer Brut Reserve (NV)
products.description: On the palate, this champagne is ample, round and fleshy; it offers the same intense sensations of fruit already present on the nose evolving towards in a more ‘compoté’ note. The finale is long lasting, harmonious and structured, ending with a beautiful freshness.

products.title: Paul Cluver Riesling Dry Encounter (2014)
products.description: The nose shows ripe green apple,apple blossom, beeswax and fynbos honey notes. The palate is crisp and clean-lemon sorbet-like however, has some more palate weight than one would normally would expect. Perfect hot weather wine-very refreshing.
